text: Benjamin Ozegovic (born 9 August 1999) is a professional footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for the club Altach. Born in Bosnia and Herzegovina, Ozegovic represents Austria internationally. ==Professional career== On 27 June 2016, Ozegovic signed with Altach. Ozegovic made his professional debut with Rheindorf Altach in a 2-0 Austrian Football Bundesliga loss to Admira on 7 March 2020. ==References== ==External links== * * DFB Profile * Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:People from Velika Kladuša Category:Austrian footballers Category:Austria youth international footballers Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina footballers Category:Austrian people of Bosnia and Herzegovina descent Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina emigrants to Austria Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:SC Rheindorf Altach players Category:Austrian Football Bundesliga players Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Austria Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina expatriates in Austria
title: Benjamin Ozegovic
